site_name: Cromer Court, Lytham Court, St David's Court
description: Details of CCTV, lighting and security lighting pursuant to condition 21 of planning permission ref: PP/2012/3052 dated 08/11/2012 for demolition of existing buildings, including the stairwell serving the southern part of Portrush Court, and erection of four rows of three-storey terrace dwellinghouses (one part two-storey) comprising 6 x three-bed, 11 x four-bed and 5 x five-bed houses; 4 co-joined part single and two-storey three-bed houses and a part three, five and six storey block of 34 flats (10 x one-bed, 20 x two-bed, 2 x three-bed and 2 x four-bed) with gardens, landscaping, 18 car-parking spaces, cycle parking, alteration to vehicle and pedestrian access and associated works, including the re-provision of a stairwell serving Portrush Court (Deemed Consent).
